casebody.data:
Lisa A. MILLER, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
Richard MILLER, Individually and as Personal Representative of the Estate of Edward J. Miller, Karen Caldemeyer, Rebecca Schipp, and Clesta Scarborough, Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 87A05-1706-EU-1320 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED June 25, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHARPNACK , Sr.J. Affirmed. VAIDIK, C.J., Concurs.

NAJAM, J., Concurs.
